column2: "We're here of our own accord. They don't need to be so formal."
"Hey! My name's Afin. Good to meet you, partner!"
"Hey, are you even listening? Partner! I'm talking to you, partner!"
"It looks like we've been paired up, so let's try to get along."
"They keep saying nice things, I guess it's just to make us comfortable. But to tell the truth here..."
"Because of the events 10 years ago, there are a lot fewer ARKS. I guess they're desperate for new recruits."

"But I don't really care about that.
I've got my own things I want to do."
"What? You don't know about what happened ten years ago?"
"...Or maybe you just wanted to forget?"
"I know exactly how you feel. I wish I could forget it all..."
"Alright! Well, let's not sweat the small stuff and just try to do our best today."
"Coordinate transfer complete. All ARKS please disembark promptly."

"Okay, we're ready to go. Looks like an easy area for newbies like us.
Let's get going."
